Citation_Information.author_list: Mainzer, A., Bauer, J., Cutri, R., Grav, T., Kramer, E., Masiero, J., Sonnett, S., and Wright, E.

External_Reference.reference_text: T. Grav, A.K. Mainzer, J. Bauer, J. Masiero, T. Spahr, and 12 others, WISE/NEOWISE Observations of the Jovian Trojans: Preliminary Results, Astroph. J. 742, 40, doi:10.1088/0004-637X/742/1/40, 2011
Grav, T., A.K. Mainzer, J.M. Bauer, J.R. Masiero, C.R. Nugent, WISE/NEOWISE Observations of the Jovian Trojan Population: Taxonomy, Astroph. J. 759, 49, doi:10.1088/0004-637X/759/1/49, 2012

Field_Delimited.name: Asteroid_Number
Field_Delimited.description: Asteroid number

Field_Delimited.name: Prov_desig
Field_Delimited.description: Provisional designation of object as assigned by the MPC

Field_Delimited.name: MPC_packed_name
Field_Delimited.description: Number or provisional designation of object in MPC-packed format. Included for locating objects in published tables

Field_Delimited.name: Absolute_mag
Field_Delimited.description: Absolute H_V magnitude used as input to fitting routine

Field_Delimited.name: Slope_param
Field_Delimited.description: G slope parameter from H-G system used for calculating photometric phase effects

Field_Delimited.name: Mean_JD
Field_Delimited.description: Mean Julian date of observations used for fitting

Field_Delimited.name: N_W1
Field_Delimited.description: Number of W1 band measurements used for thermal fitting

Field_Delimited.name: N_W2
Field_Delimited.description: Number of W2 band measurements used for thermal fitting

Field_Delimited.name: N_W3
Field_Delimited.description: Number of W3 band measurements used for thermal fitting

Field_Delimited.name: N_W4
Field_Delimited.description: Number of W4 band measurements used for thermal fitting

Field_Delimited.name: Fit_code
Field_Delimited.description: Four-character code indicating parameters allowed to vary in the thermal fit. D=diameter, V=visible geometric albedo, B=NEATM beaming parameter (or F=Fast-rotating thermal model), I=infrared geometric albedo. -=parameter held fixed for fit.

Field_Delimited.name: Diameter
Field_Delimited.description: Best-fit effective spherical diameter or assumed value if not fitted

Field_Delimited.name: Diameter_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error on diameter

Field_Delimited.name: V_albedo
Field_Delimited.description: Best-fit visible geometric albedo or assumed value if not fitted

Field_Delimited.name: V_albedo_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error on visible albedo

Field_Delimited.name: IR_albedo
Field_Delimited.description: Best-fit infrared geometric albedo or assumed value if not fitted

Field_Delimited.name: IR_albedo_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error on infrared albedo

Field_Delimited.name: Beaming_param
Field_Delimited.description: Best-fit NEATM thermal beaming parameter or assumed value if not fitted

Field_Delimited.name: Beaming_param_err
Field_Delimited.description: Error on beaming parameter

Field_Delimited.name: Stacked_flag
Field_Delimited.description: Flag indicating if fit is based on images co-added on the object's predicted position

Field_Delimited.name: Reference
Field_Delimited.description: Reference to the original publication of fitted parameters

Field_Delimited.name: Notes
Field_Delimited.description: Notes: OrbChange indicates large differences between orbit used for fitting and current orbit; NoOrb indicates no orbit for object in the current MPC database; BrokenLink indicates an object that was originally associated with one designation by the MPC, but that link was broken and a new association was made with a different designation which is now used in the table
